title: FASTQ file
description: Schema for submitting metadata for a FASTQ file.

file_type.title: File Type
file_type.description: The type of file based on the information in the file.

file_classification.title: General Classification
file_classification.description: General classification group for the File (raw, processed, ancillary (eg. index files))

read_length.title: Sequencing read length (bp)
read_length.description: Length of sequencing reads in base pairs for fastq files

instrument.title: Sequencer
instrument.internal_comment: should this be a controlled CV with enum, or another object?

paired_end.title: Paired End Identifier
paired_end.description: Which pair the file belongs to (if paired end library)

flowcell_details.title: Flowcells
flowcell_details.description: For high-throughput sequencing, the flowcells used for the sequencing of the replicate.

machine.title: Machine Name
machine.description: The lab specific name of the machine used.

barcode_in_read.title: Barcode in read
barcode_in_read.description: The read the barcode is located on.

barcode_position.title: Barcode position
barcode_position.description: The 1-based start position of the barcode in 5->3 orientation.

chunk.title: Chunk
chunk.description: The file chunk label as assigned by Illumina software when splitting up a fastq into specified chunk sizes.
chunk.comment: This label is used to re-assemble the chunks into the original file in the correct order.
